hasTopImageOffset().Description: Indicates whether the "topImageOffset" field is explicitly set to a value.

getLeftImageOffset().Description: The difference between the left position of the cover image and the actual displayed cover image. Only valid for banner layout.

getTopImageOffset().Description: The difference between the top position of the cover image and the actual displayed cover image. Only valid for banner layout.

hasLeftImageOffset().Description: Indicates whether the "leftImageOffset" field is explicitly set to a value.

ClassDesc: Extra information about the cover photo.
